title: Software Onboarding
description: Onboarding guide for software team members

learning_objectives.statement: Onboarding guide for software team members

sections.title: Overview
sections.content_markdown: Onboarding guide for software team members

steps.instruction: Review the resources associated with Software Onboarding and note key dependencies.
steps.check: Did you capture the primary goals and blockers?
steps.hint: Summarize the main objective in one sentence before proceeding.

steps.instruction: Apply the documented workflow on a realistic scenario related to Software Onboarding.
steps.check: Can you demonstrate the workflow end-to-end?
steps.hint: Start with a simplified scenario before scaling up.

questions.question: What is the primary objective of Software Onboarding?
questions.explanation: Each CADENCE module focuses on actionable procedures that support mission success.

questions.question: Which artifact should you produce after completing Software Onboarding?
questions.correct: A concise summary of actions, blockers, and next steps.
questions.explanation: Every module concludes with documentation that feeds onboarding and analytics.

sections.title: Reflection
prompts: What worked well when completing Software Onboarding?
What would you change for the next iteration?

reflection_prompts: What insight will you share with your team?
